content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content: I agree to the price of 600 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mister Heine, when I come to the apartment at the end of the month, I will be looking for a little bit more space. Would you be able to offer that?
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content: I apologize, but I am unable to make any changes to the rental price or the size of the apartment. The price of 600 Euros per month is final and non-negotiable.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand, thank you for your response. Can I pay the rent in cash?

Mister Heine, I am interested in the apartment but I am not sure if I can afford the price. Could I please ask if you can lower the rent slightly?

Mister Heine, I am unable to sign the lease agreement because I have not yet received a copy of it. Do you have a copy that you can send me?
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content:
I am sorry, but I cannot accept cash payments for the rent. The rent must be paid monthly by bank transfer.

I am sorry, but I am unable to lower the rental price of 600 Euros per month. The price is based on the market value of the apartment and the services included.

I apologize for the inconvenience, but I do not have a copy of the lease agreement that you can sign. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns. I will be happy to provide you with more information.
name: Heinrich Heine
